name: IIN (itch)
description:
"An immersive experience set in a fantastic and mysterious universe."

IN is a puzzle-platformer game based on the whimsical forces of nature.

Features

  • Relaxing gameplay
  • Discover a thought-provoking world
  • Clever and challenging puzzles
  • Be creative, there’s more than one solution per challenge
  • Different mechanics to interact with shapes, weather and the universe
  • Inspiring soundtrack

Controls

  • For the optimal experience, use your favorite joystick
  • You can also play with a mouse and keyboard
